component.text: Configure Directly Connected Static IPv6 Routes on R1

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands: Configure an IPv6 route to network 2001:DB8:ACAD:1::/64 using exit interface s0/0/0.

command.instruction: Configure an IPv6 route to network 2001:DB8:ACAD:3::/64 using exit interface s0/0/1.
Exit configuration mode and display the IPv6 routing table.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 9 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, I1 - ISIS L1, I2 - ISIS L2
IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external
ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination, NDr - Redirect
O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1, OE2 - OSPF ext 2
ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
S 2001:DB8:ACAD:1::/64 [1/0]
via Serial0/0/0, directly connected
C 2001:DB8:ACAD:2::/64 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:ACAD:2::1/128 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, receive
S 2001:DB8:ACAD:3::/64 [1/0]
via Serial0/0/1, directly connected
C 2001:DB8:ACAD:4::/64 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/0, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:ACAD:4::2/128 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/0, receive
C 2001:DB8:ACAD:5::/64 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/1, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:ACAD:5::2/128 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/1, receive
L FF00::/8 [0/0]
via Null0, receive
R2#
command.instruction: You successfully configured directly attached static IPv6 routes on R2.

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands: Configure an IPv6 route to the 2001:DB8:ACAD:1::/64, 2001:DB8:ACAD:2::/64, and 2001:DB8:ACAD:4::/64 networks using exit interface S0/0/1.

command.instruction: Exit configuration mode and display the IPv6 routing table.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 8 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, I1 - ISIS L1, I2 - ISIS L2
IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP, EX - EIGRP external
ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination, NDr - Redirect
O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1, OE2 - OSPF ext 2
ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
S 2001:DB8:ACAD:1::/64 [1/0]
via Serial0/0/1, directly connected
S 2001:DB8:ACAD:2::/64 [1/0]
via Serial0/0/1, directly connected
C 2001:DB8:ACAD:3::/64 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:ACAD:3::1/128 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, receive
S 2001:DB8:ACAD:4::/64 [1/0]
via Serial0/0/1, directly connected
C 2001:DB8:ACAD:5::/64 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/1, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:ACAD:5::1/128 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/1, receive
L FF00::/8 [0/0]
via Null0, receive
R3#
command.instruction: You successfully configured directly attached static IPv6 routes on R3.
